title: Average attendance of the main football leagues in Europe 2018 to 2019
yAxis: Average attendance in thousands of people
summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.
The Average attendance in thousands of people is highest at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and lowest at League Name Ligue 1 (France).
The minimum League Name Ligue 1 (France) has got 1.93 times less Average attendance in thousands of people than the maximum League Name Bundesliga (Germany).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.
The Average attendance in thousands of people is appeared to be the highest at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and lowest at League Name Ligue 1 (France).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.
The Average attendance in thousands of people is highest at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and lowest at League Name Ligue 1 (France).
The minimum League Name Ligue 1 (France) has got 1.93 times less Average attendance in thousands of people than the maximum League Name Bundesliga (Germany).
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing League Name, and Average attendance in thousands of people in each League Name on the y axis.
The maximum Average attendance in thousands of people 42.7 is found at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and the minimum is found at Ligue 1 (France) where League Name is 22.1.
Second maximum Average attendance in thousands of people is found at League Name Premier League (England).
The difference of Average attendance in thousands of people between the highest and lowest League Name is 20.6.

League Name Bundesliga (Germany) is higher than any other League Names with value 42.7, followed by Premier League (England), and La Liga (Spain). Down to League Name Ligue 1 (France) with the lowest value 22.1.
The average Average attendance in thousands of people in all 5 League Names is 30.94.
Summing up the values of all League Names, we get total 154.7.
